src:
获2.62亿合约 商业机器扬至两个月高位
01 Nov 2019, 04:51 by Ahmad Naqib Idris
（吉隆坡1日讯）商业机器（Mesiniaga Bhd）获得一份价值2亿6156万令吉的合约，为隶属财政部的大马会计总处（AGD）兴建新基建设施后，上扬7.38%至两个月高位。
休市时，该股起9仙，挂1.31令吉，市值为7912万令吉。半天交投量有29万9800股，相比200天平均的5万1261.5股。
根据向大马交易所的报备，合约将从今日生效，至2025年4月杪。
根据合约，商业机器将设计、供应、调试和维护基础设施硬件和软件，并为联邦政府综合财务和会计管理系统（iGFMAS）以及AGD新基础设施的支持系统进行安装、迁移测试和调试。
供应和实施期限为10个月，而硬件保修期限为60个月，从2020年5月至2025年4月。
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
Mesiniaga rises to two-month high after RM262m contract win

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
Received 262 million contracts, commercial machines rose to a two-month high
01 Nov 2019, 04:51 by Ahmad Naqib Idris
KUALA LUMPUR (April 1): The commercial machine (Mesiniaga Bhd) received a contract worth RM216.56 million for a new infrastructure in the Ministry of Finance's Malaysian General Accounting Office (AGD), which rose 7.38% to two months. High position.
At the time of the market, the stock was 9 cents, priced at RM1.31 and the market value was RM79.12 million. Half-day trading volume was 290,800 shares, compared with an average of 126,151.5 shares in 200 days.
According to the report to the Bursa Malaysia, the contract will take effect from today until April 2025.
Under the contract, commercial machines will design, supply, commission, and maintain infrastructure hardware and software, and install, migrate, test, and debug the federal government's Integrated Finance and Accounting Management System (iGFMAS) and the AGD's new infrastructure support system.
The supply and implementation period is 10 months, while the hardware warranty period is 60 months, from May 2020 to April 2025.
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
Mesiniaga rises to two-month high after RM262m contract win

Via theedgemarkets.com
